name: Streamlings
description:
Do you remember Lemmings? This is Lemmings but your Twitch viewers control the Lemmings and have to reach the goal as fast as possible. This is Streamlings!

After starting the game and connecting to your Twitch channel, viewers can join with !join.

The following commands can be used to control each Streamling:

  • !umbrella : fall softly
  • !dig : dig down
  • !block : block others
  • !walk : continue walking
  • !build : build stairs
  • !die : kill your Streamling

Your viewers can re-join even though their Streamling died.

Keep an eye on your resources on the top left!

Mods and the streamer can also restart the level with !reset
